medium: Silk, metallic threads; woven with embroidered trim
title: Abaye
description: cape-like garment; open in front, small opening for hands; maroon and gold, with blue on back; stripes, stepped zigzags and arrow designs; fancy scrolling trim around neckline; subtile blue designs on back
creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
